live_updates: Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
40920.summary: Some customers in the Marlborough and Marlborough Park area of Calgary are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
40920.title: Aug 20 – Calgary (Marlborough and Marlborough Park ) | All Services - Outage (Fix in progress)
